entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call may be recorded for quality assurance. Please state the reason for your call.
Yeah, hi. I want to return something. I bought a VeloBand Pulse a little while ago, and it's just not working out for me. I need to return it now, please.
Thank you for calling, I can certainly assist you with that. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with the purchase of the VeloBand Pulse?
It's [customer's email address]. Hurry up, I don't have all day.

Thank you. Let me pull up your order. Okay, I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse on July 10th. Today is July 25th. While I understand your frustration, our standard return window is 10 days from the date of purchase.
What?! Ten days? Seriously? I'm only a few days over! This is ridiculous! I need a refund, not some runaround. This VeloBand Pulse is garbage!

I understand your frustration, and I apologize that the VeloBand Pulse isn't meeting your needs. Unfortunately, because you are outside of the 10-day return window, I am unable to process a full refund at this time. Our policy is quite strict on the return window.
So, you're telling me I'm just stuck with this thing? That's terrible customer service! I expected better from VeloFit. Is there anything, *anything*, you can do?

While I can't authorize a full refund due to being outside of the return window, let me explore other options for you. One moment please... Okay, while a full refund isn't possible, I can offer you store credit for the full purchase price of the VeloBand Pulse. Would that be acceptable?
Store credit? Hmm... so I can get something else from VeloFit? Is that the same amount I paid originally?

Yes, the store credit will be for the full amount you paid for the VeloBand Pulse, and it can be used towards any other product on our website or in our stores. This is being offered as a policy exception in light of your situation.
Okay, well, I guess that's better than nothing. Fine, I'll take the store credit.

Great! I've just applied the store credit to your account. You should receive an email confirmation shortly with the details and instructions on how to redeem it. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thanks for working with me on that. I appreciate it.
You're welcome! We value your business. Thank you for calling VeloFit. Have a great day!
